revised_title: Obituary of Crum Brown: A Pioneering Chemist and Educator
tldr: This obituary honors the life and work of Crum Brown, a pioneering chemist and educator. He made significant contributions to the understanding of chemical combination, isomerism, and the classification of chemical substances. Brown's work in crystallography and physiology, along with his innovative teaching methods, left a lasting impact on the field of chemistry.
